The ShennongReduction Class

Source: R/AllClasses.R, R/show-method.R
ShennongReduction-class.Rd

Stores dimensionality reduction results (e.g., PCA, UMAP, tSNE) for a Shennong object. Inspired by Seurat's DimReduc structure, this class contains embeddings, optional feature loadings, standard deviations, a naming key, and metadata.

Usage

# S4 method for class 'ShennongReduction'
show(object)

Arguments

object

A ShennongReduction object.

Slots

embedding

A matrix of sample (cell) coordinates in reduced space.

loadings

A matrix of feature loadings (optional).

stdev

A numeric vector of standard deviations of each dimension.

assay_used

The name of the assay this reduction was computed from.

global

Logical. If TRUE, persists across assay removal.

key

A character prefix (e.g., "PC") prepended to column names of embedding matrix.

misc

A list of additional information.

On this page
